title: Core Competency-Based Science Curriculum Design and Visual Assessment

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental science education theories and curriculum design experience
context.additional_context: Project analyzing core competencies and interdisciplinary connectivity of science curricula for pre-/in-service teachers, sharing assessment results through data visualization

learning_goals: Learners can classify the ten core competencies of the science curriculum and analyze mapping relationships between each competency and subject areas.
Radar charts can be used to visualize and interpret curriculum-competency alignment data
Curriculum improvement reports can be created for sharing with peer teachers and stakeholders

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
